sentences.en: Actually Xiangzi's preferential treatment was on another account.
sentences.cn: 其实呢,刘老头子的优待祥子是另有笔账儿.

sentences.en: Don't expect to get preferential treatment .
Glutamine rather than ammonia may be the preferential substrate.
sentences.cn: 谷酰胺可能是比氨还要合适的底物.

sentences.en: Highways or public transportation, which should be given preferential financing?
sentences.cn: 公路与公共交通哪个应获得优先资助?

sentences.en: It has been the preferential price.
Like retaliation tariff, preferential tariff is used as a weapon in international relations.
sentences.cn: 与报复性关税一样, 特惠关税在国际关系中也被当成一种武器使用.

sentences.en: Location, preferential price, is your best travel tourism accommodation.
sentences.cn: 地理位置优越, 价格特惠, 是你旅游出行的最佳住处.

sentences.en: Nobody gets preferential treatment in this office!
sentences.cn: 本办事处无论对谁均一视同仁!

sentences.en: preferential credit terms for reliable borrowers
sentences.cn: 向可靠借款人提供的优惠信贷条件

sentences.en: She traded on her disability to get preferential treatment wherever she went.
sentences.cn: 她无论妻哪里都利用她的残疾获取优待.

sentences.en: Subsidiary company get preferential treatment when it come to subcontract work.
sentences.cn: 分公司承接转包(二包)工作时会得到优惠待遇.

sentences.en: Supplier will provide user with other accessory options a preferential price.
sentences.cn: 供货方将以优惠价格向用户提供其它选加附件.

sentences.en: This failure is known as preferential wetting and is responsible for blistering.
sentences.cn: 这种故障称为优先吸湿,是产生气泡的原因.

sentences.en: This hotel gives preferential treatment to people who stay in it regularly.
sentences.cn: 旅馆给那些常客优惠待遇.

sentences.en: This preferential ticket entitles you to travel first class.
sentences.cn: 凭这张优惠票,你可以坐头等舱旅行.

sentences.en: We can get preferential duty rates when we ship to the U.S.A.
sentences.cn: 我们能在货物装运到媄慖时获得优惠税率.

words.tran_cn: [税收]优先的；选择的；[贸易]特惠的；先取的

phrases.tran_cn: 优先定位；择优定向；最佳取向

trans.tran_cn: 优先的，优先选择的，特惠的
trans.tran_en: preferential treatment, rates etc are deliberately different in order to give an advantage to particular people
